question: Michael hires a luxury car from 1 PM to 10 PM. He gets 2 hour(s) free. The first paid hour is €23 and each hour after that is four times the cost. How much did he pay?
answer:
He got it for 10-1=<<10-1=9>>9 hours
He pays for 9-2=<<9-2=7>>7 hours
The first hour cost 1*23=€<<1*23=23>>23
The other 7-1=6 hours are more expensive
They cost 23*4=€<<23*4=92>>92 per hour
So those 6 hours cost 6*92=€<<6*92=552>>552
So he pays 552+23=€<<552+23=575>>575 in total
#### 575
